00036 bool getbit(const integer& n, size_t bit) {
00037     size_t index=bit/bits_per_digit;
00038     if (index < n._get_length()) {
00039         digit_t mask=(digit_t(1) << (bit % bits_per_digit));
00040         return ((n._get_digit(index) & mask) != 0);
00041     } else return false;
00042 }
00043 
00051 void setbit(integer& n, size_t bit) {
00052     n._make_unique();
00053     detail::data_t *ndata=n._get_data();
00054 
00055     size_t index=bit/bits_per_digit;
00056     if (index >= n._get_length()) ndata->realloc(index+1);
00057 
00058     digit_t mask=(digit_t(1) << (bit % bits_per_digit));
00059     ndata->digits[index] |= mask;
00060     ndata->skipLeadingZeros();
00061 }
00062 
00070 void clearbit(integer& n, size_t bit) {
00071     size_t index=bit/bits_per_digit;
00072     if (index < n._get_length()) {
00073         n._make_unique();
00074         digit_t mask=(digit_t(1) << (bit % bits_per_digit));
00075         n._get_data()->digits[index] &= ~mask;
00076         n._get_data()->skipLeadingZeros();
00077     }
00078 }
00079 
00089 size_t lowestbit(const integer& n, size_t valueIfZero) {
00090     if (n.sign()==0) return valueIfZero;
00091 
00092     const detail::data_t *ndata=n._get_data();
00093     const digit_t *p=ndata->digits, *pe=p+ndata->mLength;
00094     while (p!=pe && *p==0) ++p;
00095 
00096     size_t index=(p - ndata->digits);
00097     size_t r=(bits_per_digit * index);
00098     digit_t digit=*p;
00099 
00100     while ((digit & 0x01)==0) {
00101         digit>>=1;
00102         ++r;
00103     }
00104 
00105     return r;
00106 }
00107 
00117 size_t highestbit(const integer& n, size_t valueIfZero) {
00118     if (n.sign()==0) return valueIfZero;
00119     return static_cast<size_t>(log2(n)-1);
00120 }

00128 integer bitwise_and(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {
00129     const detail::data_t *smaller=n1._get_data(), *larger=n2._get_data();
00130     if (smaller->mLength > larger->mLength) std::swap(smaller, larger);
00131 
00132     integer r;
00133     detail::data_t *rdata=r._get_data();
00134     rdata->alloc(smaller->mLength);
00135 
00136     const digit_t *s1=smaller->digits, *s1e=s1+smaller->mLength, *s2=larger->digits;
00137     digit_t *t=rdata->digits;
00138 
00139     while (s1 < s1e) *t++ = *s1++ & *s2++;
00140 
00141     rdata->skipLeadingZeros();
00142     return r;
00143 }
00144 
00151 integer bitwise_or(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {
00152     const detail::data_t *smaller=n1._get_data(), *larger=n2._get_data();
00153     if (smaller->mLength > larger->mLength) std::swap(smaller, larger);
00154 
00155     integer r;
00156     detail::data_t *rdata=r._get_data();
00157     rdata->alloc(larger->mLength);
00158 
00159     const digit_t *s1=smaller->digits, *s1e=s1+smaller->mLength;
00160     const digit_t *s2=larger->digits, *s2e=s2+larger->mLength;
00161     digit_t *t=rdata->digits;
00162 
00163     while (s1<s1e) *t++ = *s1++ | *s2++;
00164     while (s2<s2e) *t++ = *s2++;
00165 
00166     rdata->skipLeadingZeros();
00167     return r;
00168 }
00169 
00177 integer bitwise_xor(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {
00178     const detail::data_t *smaller=n1._get_data(), *larger=n2._get_data();
00179     if (smaller->mLength > larger->mLength) std::swap(smaller, larger);
00180 
00181     integer r;
00182     detail::data_t *rdata=r._get_data();
00183     rdata->alloc(larger->mLength);
00184 
00185     const digit_t *s1=smaller->digits, *s1e=s1+smaller->mLength;
00186     const digit_t *s2=larger->digits, *s2e=s2+larger->mLength;
00187     digit_t *t=rdata->digits;
00188 
00189     while (s1<s1e) *t++ = *s1++ ^ *s2++;
00190     while (s2<s2e) *t++ = *s2++;
00191 
00192     rdata->skipLeadingZeros();
00193     return r;
00194 }
00195 
00204 integer shift(const integer& n, int byBits) {
00205     if (byBits > 0) return shift_left(n, byBits);
00206     else return shift_right(n, -byBits);
00207 }
00208 
00216 integer shift_left(const integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00217     if (byBits==0) return n;
00218 
00219     integer nn(n);
00220     nn._make_unique();
00221     nn._get_data()->shift_left(byBits);
00222     return nn;
00223 }
00224 
00232 integer shift_right(const integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00233     if (byBits==0) return n;
00234 
00235     integer nn(n);
00236     nn._make_unique();
00237     nn._get_data()->shift_right(byBits);
00238     return nn;
00239 }
